summary: Lab technician Virgil Gurdies struggles to choose between his truelove Angie and his newfound quest to create the greatest goat cheese the world has ever known.
cast: Mark Meir|Sydney Andrews|Stephen Taylor Fry|Dan Braverman|Michael Sullivan|Justin Arnold|Sarah Holland|Harrison Butler|Robert Tolaro|Laurie Coker|Marlane Barnes|Jordan Crowder|Jason McEntire|Richard Reininger|Varun Rajendran|Michael Nolen|Daniel Moczygemba|Bruce Tavakkol|Martin Pedersen|Charles Gonzalez|Diesel|Mae Reininger|Brooke Hyatt|Cliff Bogart|Kyle Bogart|Blake Buesnel|Ryan Pollei|Amber Reber|Kendra Heath|David Lamb|Oscar Aparicio|Dale Staffel|Jeremy Dertien|Ryan Reininger|David Blue Garcia|Daniel Kalbacher
title: Artois the Goat
